text: Trailer Tuesday explores the office politics of rats, travels the stars in an spacefaring monastery, and scraps with nasty plants this week. Shogun Showdown “Turn-based combat where every action counts. Carefully position yourself, build up and unleash your attacks at the right time!” Shogun Showdown is available now on the Nintendo eShop, PlayStation Store, Microsoft Store, GOG, and Steam. Paper Ghost Stories: Third Eye Open “The game is set in a small Malaysian suburb which the player navigates to speak to friends, families, and ghosts.” Paper Ghost Stories: Third Eye Open is available now on the Nintendo eShop, PlayStation Store, Microsoft Store, and Steam. The Banished Vault “A strategy game of exploration, endurance, and space travel on an interstellar gothic monastery.” The Banished Vault is available now on Steam. Rats in a Cage “As a typical corporate rat, you manipulate your coworkers with coffee and gossip and take credit for their work in order to beat every level of a skill assessment test controlled by a cheeky AI that goes beyond the game window to stop you.” Rats in a Cage is available now on Steam. TIMORE NARHELMA “Are you afraid that if you wake up you won’t recognize your life, but forever remember the dream you lived?” TIMORE NARHELMA is available now on Steam. Devil’s Hideout “Lauren learns from a mystic that her young sister is still alive, with cultists staging her death. Traveling to the hospital where her sister received care, Lauren plunges headfirst into a nightmare.” Devil’s Hideout is available now on Steam. Witching Stone “Incrementally improve your spellbook, and find patterns on a unique puzzle grid, to battle deeper and deeper into the dungeon!” Witching Stone is available now on itch.io and Steam. Copycat “A poignant narrative-driven game about rejection, belonging and the meaning of home. It follows the story of a newly adopted shelter cat whose space in the home is taken by a copycat.” Copycat is available now on Steam. Perennial Order “Set in an atmospheric Dark Age world plagued by nature-infested horrors, explore a lore-filled and eldritch land alone or in two player co-op, all in a realistic painterly style.” Perennial Order is available now on the PlayStation Store, the Microsoft Store, the Epic Games Store, and Steam. Panic In The Woods “Lost in a creepy forest, you and your friends are hunted by a monster. Stay quiet while extracting keys through nightmarish realms using items like traps, sonars, and flare guns to survive!” Panic In The Woods is available now on Steam. About The Author Joel Couture Joel has been covering indie games for various sites including IndieGames.com, Siliconera, Gamasutra, Warp Door, CG Magazine, and more over the past seven years, and has written book-length studies on Undertale and P.T.. Joel is constantly on the lookout for digital experiences that push the boundaries of what games can be, and seeks to delve into the creative process, meanings, and emotion labor that goes into the work of artists worldwide.
html:
Trailer Tuesday explores the office politics of rats, travels the stars in an spacefaring monastery, and scraps with nasty plants this week.

Shogun Showdown

“Turn-based combat where every action counts. Carefully position yourself, build up and unleash your attacks at the right time!”

Shogun Showdown is available now on the Nintendo eShop, PlayStation Store, Microsoft Store, GOG, and Steam.

Paper Ghost Stories: Third Eye Open

“The game is set in a small Malaysian suburb which the player navigates to speak to friends, families, and ghosts.”

Paper Ghost Stories: Third Eye Open is available now on the Nintendo eShop, PlayStation Store, Microsoft Store, and Steam.

The Banished Vault

“A strategy game of exploration, endurance, and space travel on an interstellar gothic monastery.”

The Banished Vault is available now on Steam.

Rats in a Cage

“As a typical corporate rat, you manipulate your coworkers with coffee and gossip and take credit for their work in order to beat every level of a skill assessment test controlled by a cheeky AI that goes beyond the game window to stop you.”

Rats in a Cage is available now on Steam.

TIMORE NARHELMA

“Are you afraid that if you wake up you won’t recognize your life, but forever remember the dream you lived?”

TIMORE NARHELMA is available now on Steam.

Devil’s Hideout

“Lauren learns from a mystic that her young sister is still alive, with cultists staging her death. Traveling to the hospital where her sister received care, Lauren plunges headfirst into a nightmare.”

Devil’s Hideout is available now on Steam.

Witching Stone

“Incrementally improve your spellbook, and find patterns on a unique puzzle grid, to battle deeper and deeper into the dungeon!”

Witching Stone is available now on itch.io and Steam.

Copycat

“A poignant narrative-driven game about rejection, belonging and the meaning of home. It follows the story of a newly adopted shelter cat whose space in the home is taken by a copycat.”

Copycat is available now on Steam.

Perennial Order

“Set in an atmospheric Dark Age world plagued by nature-infested horrors, explore a lore-filled and eldritch land alone or in two player co-op, all in a realistic painterly style.”

Perennial Order is available now on the PlayStation Store, the Microsoft Store, the Epic Games Store, and Steam.

Panic In The Woods

“Lost in a creepy forest, you and your friends are hunted by a monster. Stay quiet while extracting keys through nightmarish realms using items like traps, sonars, and flare guns to survive!”

Panic In The Woods is available now on Steam.

About The Author

Joel Couture

Joel has been covering indie games for various sites including IndieGames.com, Siliconera, Gamasutra, Warp Door, CG Magazine, and more over the past seven years, and has written book-length studies on Undertale and P.T.. Joel is constantly on the lookout for digital experiences that push the boundaries of what games can be, and seeks to delve into the creative process, meanings, and emotion labor that goes into the work of artists worldwide.
